bilingual.source: The decision of the purchaser on acquisition;
bilingual.target: 收购人关于收购的决定；

bilingual.source: Acquisition of the listed company is a typical practice.
bilingual.target: 典型的股权收购则是对上市公司的收购.

bilingual.source: Tender offer is a main form of listed company acquisition.
bilingual.target: 要约收购则是上市公司收购的重要形式。

bilingual.source: Are mergers and acquisition showing some trends?
For the museum had no acquisition policy .
bilingual.target: 博物馆没有任何收购政策。

bilingual.source: What do you think of this acquisition?
bilingual.target: 对于此次收购您有什么看法呢？

bilingual.source: Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed.
bilingual.target: 收购的具体条款并未公布。

bilingual.source: If they are, we will give up the acquisition.
bilingual.target: 如果是这样，我们将放弃收购。

bilingual.source: Plans relevant to the acquisition of listed companies;
bilingual.target: 上市公司收购的有关方案；

bilingual.source: The acquisition will be in cash plus equity.
bilingual.target: 本次收购将采用现金加股权的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Well the prevailing theory was that the hijacking was a cover for the acquisition and sale of classified intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最有可能的解释是，这起劫持是为了给获取和出售机密情报做掩护的幌子。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, your acquisition by this program as well as the program itself has been reviewed and sanctioned by a military court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，你大脑的使用权和整个项目都通过了军事法庭的审核。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 购买; 收购; 购得物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 购买; 收购; 购得物

examination_example.sentence: What is true about Wunderlist and Sunrise after their <highlight>acquisitions</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Wunderlist和Sunrise收购后的真实情况如何?

examination_example.sentence: This week, it asked the five most valuable US tech companies for information about their many small <highlight>acquisitions</highlight> over the past decade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周，该公司询问了五家最有价值的美国科技公司，询问它们在过去十年中进行的许多小规模收购的信息。

examination_example.sentence: Much more could be done to encourage "long-termism," such as changes in the tax code and quicker disclosure of stock <highlight>acquisitions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以采取更多措施鼓励“长期主义”，比如改变税法，加快披露收购股票的信息。
它的内容获取不需要任何成本。

examination_example.sentence: It is a central element in the <highlight>acquisition</highlight> of status and the production of scientific knowledge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是获得地位和生产科学知识的中心因素。

examination_example.sentence: Humans are born with an innate language-<highlight>acquisition</highlight> capacity that dictates a universal grammar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类与生俱来的语言习得能力决定了通用语法。

word_usage.usage: acquisition指“（知识、技能等的）获得，得到”或“购置；收购（的行为）”时，是抽象名词，不可数；指“购得物”和“收购的公司、购置的产业”时，是可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
